pageTitle: The Prime Minister announces a change in the senior ranks of the Office of the Secretary to the Governor General | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, today announced the following change in the senior ranks of the Office of the Secretary to the Governor General:

Ian McCowan, currently Deputy Secretary to the Cabinet (Governance), Privy Council Office, becomes Secretary to the Governor General, effective February 1, 2021.

The Prime Minister also announced that Marie-Geneviève Mounier, currently Associate Secretary to the Governor General, will continue in this role.

Biographical notes

  • Ian McCowan
  • Marie-Geneviève Mounier
